Though it looks similar to a standard compost bin, the Green Johanna is designed with additional features that most standard compost bins do not have - it is rodent proof and is well insulated. This means that the composting process is quicker than in a standard compost bin and you can put in all types of food waste, including cooked food, bones, fish and meat, which should not be added to a standard compost bin.

Features

  • Includes: Green Johanna Hot Composter + Stirring Stick + Home Composting Made Easy manual
  • Capacity: 74 Gallons
  • Dimensions: 39" Base Diameter x 21" Top Diameter x 37" Height
  • Designed to last for at least 10 years
  • Works all year round
  • Suitable for families of up to 5 people (260 pounds of food waste per person per year)
  • Helps to keep your garbage bins clean
  • Takes ALL food waste including meat, bones, and dairy, and requires a minimum of an additional 30% garden waste
  • Entirely safe for you and your pets

Light up your night with a solar powered, motion detected outdoor security light!

This solar powered light is a bright (over 600 lumen) Halogen Security Light that installs easily where utility wiring is impractical or expensive. A patented passive infrared motion detector is able to detect activity up to 23m/75 feet away controls the light. When activated, the Solar Centurion throws a flood light into the target area for up to 3 minutes or as long as there is movement in the area.

It is perfect for security lighting or convenience lighting in your yard, at your garage, around your garage, or wherever security lighting is required at night!

The light is replaceable at any lighting or hardware store (Sylvania 1995/ERK miniature Halogen Lamp).

Chlorine is designed to kill living organisms that contaminate your water source. But your plants rely on some of those fungi and bacteria to survive and thrive. This portable unit attaches to your garden spigot and eliminates the harsh toxic effects of chlorine that would otherwise compromise the health of your garden. Use the Gard'n Gro to enhance the effectiveness of non-chemical pest control methods and protect ladybugs, lacewings, and beneficial nematodes. Comes with replaceable cartridge filters that last 20,000 gallons. Also available are replacement cartridge filters and pre-filter, which extends the life of the filters by trapping sediment before it reaches the filter.

The EcoStrip is a power strip and surge protector for your computer and connected devices (printer, scanner, external hard drive) with one important difference: when you shut down the computer, everything else plugged into the EcoStrip is also shut down. This saves energy and saves you money!
There's no programming necessary - you don't even need to turn the EcoStrip off.

According to the Department of Energy, http://www.energy.gov/applianceselectronics.htm, many appliances continue to draw a small amount of power when they are switched off. These "phantom loads" (or vampire power) occur in most appliances that use electricity, such as televisions, stereos, computers, dvd players, phone chargers and kitchen appliances. Block "vampire power" by turning them all the way off with the EcoStrip! One EcoStrip can save up to $150 per year (depending on how many electronics are plugged into the EcoStrip and for how long you turn off your computer every day).

Need an easy green way to transport information?
These sleek eco-friendly flash drives are better for the environment because they contain no lead, mercury, cadium or other toxics, and they decompose easier than their traditional counterparts.

Advances in technology and materials have allowed us to produce eco-friendly drives with the same quality and price as conventional models. The traditional packaging has also been replaced with recyclable materials -- generating even less consumer waste.

Post Consumer 3 Ring Binder 3 in. Spine

These recycled binders are very durable and more resistant to spine-tearing than the traditional vinyl binders. It is truly recyclable and reusable because it is a corrugated cardboard binder. Vinyl binders are neither recyclable nor reusable.
Post Consumer 3 Ring Binder 3 in. Spine

Unlike vinyl binders that use rivets to attach their ring metals, these have ring metals that are affixed using two screws and t-nuts that can be "reused" without any waste. We believe it's unlikely you'll ever need to replace your binder cover, but if you do, it can be recycled back into the system and kept out of the landfill.

Binder Details

  • Dimensions: 8 x 11, 1 inch
  • Binding: 3 ring binder
  • Paper Process: PCW,35-38% post consumer content 100% recyclable Better than a vinyl/plastic 3 ring binder

LEARN MORE: What is PCF & PCW?

Process(ed) Chlorine Free (PCF) Applies to post-consumer recycled content only as it means that no chorine (or compounds) were used "this time around" but there may be traces of chlorine present because of earlier processes which where not of our own production process to make sustainable papers. 

Post-Consumer Material (PCW) Waste paper that has served its intended purpose and has been separated from solid waste to be recycled into new paper. This is what you and I take to the recycling center.

Glamping, anyone? This large tent has 2 bedrooms that each sleep 2 people. Both rooms are accessed from a central hall thats tall enough to stand up in. The hall doesn't have a floor, so you can use it to deal with wet gear without getting your sleeping bags wet or gritty. Store your bikes in it, dry your wetsuit, or use it as a sheltered dining area. An optional ground sheet converts the hall to a bedroom that sleeps up to 4 additional campers.

• Central hall has doors with zippable mesh ventilation at either end.
  • Hall has numerous hanging points for drying lines or lanterns.
  • Each 2-person room has double pockets.
  • Hall has 4 storage pockets.
  • Optional floor for central hall available separately.

Store your bikes in it, dry your wetsuit, or use it as a sheltered dining area. An optional ground sheet converts the hall to a bedroom that sleeps up to 4 additional campers.

• Central hall has doors with zippable mesh ventilation at either end.
  • Hall has numerous hanging points for drying lines or lanterns.
  • Each 2-person room has double pockets.
  • Hall has 4 storage pockets.
  • Optional floor for central hall available separately.
Terraclime is a soft-sided, multi-purpose pouch made of over 95% recycled materials.

• Recycled fabric, webbing and hardware helps reduce environmental impact—over 95% of the total content is made from recycled materials
  • Durable, Cyclepet® exterior fabric is made from 100% post-consumer PET bottles
  • Soft-sided pouch with layered construction of fabric and spacer mesh to provide light protection and offer a non-camera bag design to the fashion-savvy consumer
  • Double-loop hook closures provide a slim fit or expand for extra capacity—made of plastic regrind (post-industrial buckles and hardware trimmings recycled and repurposed)
  • Interior pockets hold extra memory cards
  • Adjustable, detachable shoulder strap

This unique device uses a curved reflective mirror instead of a parabolic one to evenly heat up the food.

The CTI Solar Oven is a solar trough cooker. It uses a curved reflective mirror to focus the light evenly onto a horizontal tray, rather than concentrating it in one spot like a typical parabolic solar cooker. The designer is Don Moran, a volunteer at Compatible Technology, Inc., after many years as an engineer in the defense communications and electronics industry.

Unique with this cooker, is the amount of scientific testing that went into understanding its performance under different conditions. Review the paper on his research here. The experiments were conducted in St.Paul, Minnesota, USA, which is at approximately 45N latitude.

Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus Solar Recharging Kit
Charge your stuff directly from the suns power or bank it for a cloudy day. The weather-resistant solar panel connects to your USB/12V gear or to the 4 AA batteries in the Guide 10 Plus recharger.
Goal Zero Guide 10 Plus Solar Recharging Kit

• Nomad 7 monocystalline solar panel is light, folds compactly, and can be chained with other panels.
  • Rated power is 7W.
  • USB port (output) is 5V, up to 1A (5W max), regulated.
  • USB-mini port (input) is 5V, up to 0.8A (4W max), regulated.
  • Mini solar port (input) is 6.5V, up to 1.1A.
  • Guide 10 battery charger/battery pack holds 4 AA or AAA batteries and can be charged via solar panels or any USB power source. It has a built-in LED flashlight.
  • Includes 4, 2300 mAh NiMH AA batteries to power AA compatible devices, or USB powered devices via the Guide 10.
  • Includes 12V power point adapter and AAA adapter.

This unique model lights your way at home in an emergency or outdoors while camping -- with the power of the sun! Enjoy the outdoors without worrying about replacing batteries or changing a propane tank.

This unique model lights your way at home in an emergency or outdoors while camping -- with the power of the sun! Enjoy the outdoors without worrying about replacing batteries or changing a propane tank.

Our solar lamp recharges each day by the sun and is ready to light up your night!

This durable, technologically-advanced unit includes extra features like an upper torch for reading, a radio and a PL lamp with light output of up to 7 hours. It even comes with an AC/DC adaptor that will charge the rechargeable battery at home at night.

Vers has taken the popularity of the ipod and crafted a beautiful, brilliant-sounding system that makes a minimal impact on the environment. Made from sustainable, plantation-grown wood (without toxic chemicals or heavy metals) this stereo system amplifies digital music. Each system is unique, finished by hand, and takes over a week to build.

Great Sound: This system is 'rigidity' - which assures that the enclosure itself does not resonate under pressure from the speaker and won't alter the natural, intended sound of the speakers themselves.

A Vers cabinet is more than 4 times thicker than its plastic counterparts - it is 9.5mm thick vs. 2mm for a typical plastic system.

Renewable: The Eucalyptus and Pine wood stock chosen for the core of Vers comes from locally sourced and managed plantations near their factory; any trees that are harvested are replanted. The wood used in a Vers system replaces 80% of what could have been plastic.
And, the paper packaging is 100% post-consumer recycled stock and nearly all of the internal plastic packaging, bags & wrapping have either been replaced with post-consumer paper or eliminated altogether.

Okay, it's not magic, but these enchanting solar-powered spheres contain LEDs that gently cycle through various hypnotic colors.

You've probably seen solar-powered lights before, particularly if you're a Firebox regular. But we bet you've never seen ones like these. Why? Well for starters Solar Lights gently cycle through various hypnotic colours - perfect for your ever-changing moods. Better still they float. You heard, they float!

This means you can plop them in your pond or swimming pool. And if you haven't got a pool we suggest you start digging because the effect of a few Solar Lights bobbing around on shimmering water is quite mesmerising.

With their attractive spherical styling and durable waterproof casing, Solar Lights are specifically designed for outdoor use. They even feature a handy hoop so you can hang them from parasols and branches. If you're looking to add a touch of magic to summer evenings al fresco, Solar Lights are perfect. Simply dot them around your borders or under your favourite plants and the whole garden is transformed into an enchanting wonderland of colourful, gently glowing light.

As well as a colour-changing LED, each Solar Light contains a NiCad battery and solar panel. Just allow the panel to soak up a few rays and you'll never have to faff around with candles again. Besides, who can be bothered with all that wick-trimming business? Not us, because throwing an outdoor soiree is hectic enough without having to play hunt-the-tealights. And that's before they get blown out by a gust of wind.

http://www.shopwiki.com/

Love the squishy feel of neoprene, but hate toxins like VOCs? The green revolution continues with Neogreene, a ground-breaking material that uses the best qualities of neoprene while getting rid of the toxic glues that used to be necessary for holding the material together!

GreenSmart abandoned the chloroprene chemistry of neoprene entirely and developed a material with all the attributes without the hazards. It's water based chemistry that allows for water based adhesives that still provides the squishy and smooth material with a little bit of stretch. As a bonus, Neogreene uses 25% less electricity and 25% less petroleum to produce than neoprene.

There is more to a sleeve than meets the eye. This laptop sleeve has 4mm walls for optimal protection and minimum weight, and a specially designed gusset and mesh interior.

Ever think about putting your hot laptop in an insulated sleeve? Now your laptop will cool down that much faster. The neogreene is waterproof, too, so if you spill on the outside, no problem. Easy to grab zipper pulls (2, by the way) complete this far from ordinary sleeve.

Compact fluorescent (CF) lighting reduces your electricity consumption, and the long lifespan of CF bulbs will save you money. By duplicating full-spectrum natural lighting in an energy-saving compact fluorescent bulb, Ott-Lites provide sharp, consistent visibility for close tasks. The ballast has been eliminated from the lamp itself: now it is in the transformer by the plug.

Compact fluorescent (CF) lighting reduces your electricity consumption, and the long lifespan of CF bulbs will save you money. By duplicating full-spectrum natural lighting in an energy-saving compact fluorescent bulb, Ott-Lites provide sharp, consistent visibility for close tasks. The ballast has been eliminated from the lamp itself: now it is in the transformer by the plug.

This task lamp clamps on anywhere. It has a 13-watt, radiation shielded, full spectrum bulb with a special reflector to maximize light output. Both the arm and neck are flexible for easy positioning.

We carry this lamp in grey.

This battery charger will help you live a more environmentally friendly life! Both the product and the batteries are rechargeable (it can be used over 1,000 times!), and lithium and NiMH batteries do not contain heavy materials such as mercury and are thus not considered hazardous waste!

• The 49 watt battery can run your laptop for up to 3 hours
  • Stays charged for up to 6 months before needing to recharge it
  • Charges in approximately 5 hours
  • Simple voltage wheel to select the connection to your laptop for power
  • USB port can power or charge your cell phone, digital camera/camcorder, MP3/iPod, PSP, and more
  • All of the required power tips are in the box

Govino Shatterproof Recyclable Stemless Wine Glasses
Shatterproof, Elegant, Reusable...and Recyclable! This is the ultimate go anywhere, reusable, ergonomic stemless wine glass.
Govino Shatterproof Recyclable Stemless Wine Glasses

The Govino shatterproof wine glass was originally created as a trade tool to help professional salespeople showcase their wines whenever and wherever proper stemware wasn't accessible. Govino was designed for commercial use and can withstand most industrial glass sanitation systems (1-2 minutes at 160F). Since domestic dishwashers are so widely varied, we cannot claim this product is 100% dishwasher safe. The govino wine glass is meant to be replaced after an extended period of use.

This Hemp Shower curtain transforms your bathroom environment by bringing nature into your everyday life!
Hemp shower curtains are a beautiful, soft, subtly aromatic and a healthy alternative to conventional vinyl shower curtains, which off-gas toxic chemicals that are harmful to human health and contribute to indoor air pollution. These hemp shower curtains, unlike vinyl, can be machine washed. After washing, simply hang the curtain back on its grommets to dry. Wrinkles will disappear from the humidity produced while you're showering!

Hemp plants use less water than cotton plants and supply greater fiber yield per acre. Using a hemp shower curtain demonstrates your concern for the environment by decreasing the use of chemicals and plastics in the production process, reducing landfills in the post-consumer phase, and supporting the use of hemp as a promising alternative to cotton and other conventional fibers.

Please note: These shower curtains are hand-made and typically take up to 2 weeks to make. Please allow up to 3 weeks for delivery.
Also due to the hand-made nature of these curtains, an additional 25% restocking fee will apply if returned without defects. Returns will not be accepted if washed or used. Hemp's intrinsic durability and the sturdy, rustproof grommets will enable your curtain to last for years.

The Airfree Eco60 version of the Worlds Safest and Most Tested Air Purifier. It purifies a volume of 60 Cubic Metres but only uses 45 Watts of electricity. Airfree TSS technology uses heated air to destroy airborne mould, bacteria, viruses, dust mites, and pollen allergens. It is a great product for people living with allergies, asthma, or other respiratory conditions.

Not only the most tested air purifier, but the most successfully tested because Airfree's exclusive patented Thermodynamic Sterilising System (TSS) technology has been independently tested in real life working environments by world renowned institutions and ISO 17025 laboratories in six different countries including the USA, Sweden and Germany. These tests have helped prove that Airfree products totally destroys up to 99.99%
microorganisms that pass through its patented TSS no matter how small or hazardous they might be.

Use it, Love it, Recycle it. Introducing the newest member of the Aladdin Sustain Collection the Recycled & Recyclable Mug. Made from eCycle a food-grade safe recycle plastic material which can also be recycled, this mug is designed to keep you, and the earth happy.

Do your part for the environment: Use this recycled travel mug for your take-out coffee instead of paper or Styrofoam cups. Not only does Aladdin make the mug from 100% FDA-approved recycled plastic, known as eCycle, but it's completely recyclable itself at any place that recycles plastic. (It's imprinted with the number 5 on the bottom.) Down the line, this mug may end up being transformed into outdoor decking, park benches, or planters. The travel mug is the first item to be launched from Aladdin's Sustain collection.

Not only does using this travel mug make you feel virtuous, but it works. Double-wall construction keeps up to 14 ounces of your drink hot or cold, and the twist-off lid helps prevent accidents. Slim and attractive, with wavy lines adding subtle decoration, the tumbler shape fits into standard car cupholders. You can even warm your drink in the microwave using this mug, and slip it into the dishwasher for carefree cleanup. Choose your color, and start reducing waste. The Earth will thank you for it.

Give your child the kit that gives back! Introducing the Earth Kit, a wonderful kit of products that helps your child become knowledgable about the environment and all they can do to go green!

This kit includes:

  • The Everything Kids Environment Book by Sheri Amsels
  • A 16 oz spill proof BPA Free Camelbak Water Bottle with the "Kids Go Green" Logo
  • An organic T-Shirt with the special "Kids Go Green" Logo
  • A seeded download card. Kids can download two songs for free and then plant the card and watch the seeds grow into a plant.
  • A stainless steel dog tag with the earth kit logo... Kids love to decorate their backpacks with these dog tags.
  • A "Green at Heart" wristband provided by the National Wildlife Federation.
  • A tree will be planted on the child's name provided by American Forest.
  • All of the products will come in a cardboard box that has been made from recycled materials.

These fun eco torches for the kids are hand-squeezing kinetic flashlights in the shape of a penguin. Great for teaching about self generating energy and how not to use batteries. Power is generated by releasing the wing of the creature and squeezing it.

These torches are very attractive, well made and eco educational at the same time. They can stand in an upright position, using the feet of the Penguin. 1 minute squeezing gives 6-8 minutes shine time.
